title: DHAXIT: Collective silence, bar a short post, signals tense parting?
content: Jagdeep Dhankhar abruptly resigned as Vice-President. This followed tension and disagreement over his decisions. PM Modi's terse message hinted at the discord. Dhankhar's move regarding Justice Varma's removal motion sparked government's disapproval. His perceived indulgence of the opposition further fueled the rift. The government's swift actions led to Dhankhar's resignation on health grounds.

title: 'Shot down five planes': Trump repeats India-Pak ceasefire claim for 25th time
content: US President Trump has repeatedly claimed credit for averting a potential "nuclear war" between India and Pakistan, asserting US intervention halted escalating conflict. While a US diplomat echoed this at the UN, stating the US facilitated de-escalation, India denies any third-party mediation. Moreover, the Congress questioned Prime Minister Modi's silence on Trump's repeated claims.

title: ‘You can’t change colours’: Indian student attacked in Adelaide racist assault; one arrested
content: An Indian international student, Charanpreet Singh, was brutally assaulted in Adelaide, with the attack being investigated as potentially racially motivated. Singh and his wife were allegedly ambushed by a group of men who shouted racial slurs before inflicting serious injuries. The incident has sparked outrage and renewed calls for enhanced safety measures for international students in the area.

title: IND vs ENG Test: What to expect from Old Trafford Pitch? 'Very, very...'
content: Ahead of the fourth Test at Old Trafford, opinions diverge on the pitch conditions. Shubman Gill anticipates more bounce, while David Lloyd and Michael Vaughan foresee a flat, slow surface favoring spin. Mark Ramprakash suggests India might include Kuldeep Yadav, given Old Trafford's traditional dryness and potential for turn as the match progresses.

title: ‘I would never have…’: Astronomer's new CEO breaks silence on ex-boss and HR head
content: Astronomer, a Cincinnati-based tech startup, faces an unexpected leadership transition after its former CEO resigned following a viral kiss cam incident at a Coldplay concert. Co-founder Pete DeJoy steps in as interim CEO, aiming to stabilize the billion-dollar company amidst the fallout. DeJoy emphasizes resilience and commitment to employees and customers, highlighting Astronomer's ability to overcome past challenges.

title: Dombivli clinic: Man kicks, punches receptionist after being asked to wait
content: Gokul Jha, a 25-year-old man, was arrested by Manpada police in Dombivli for physically assaulting Sonali Kalasar, a receptionist at Dr. Aniket Palande's clinic. Jha, accompanying relatives with a baby for a check-up, became enraged when asked to wait, leading to the assault captured on video. The incident sparked protests, prompting police action and Jha's subsequent arrest.

title: ‘Desperate calls, emails…’: TCS delays onboarding 600 lateral hires
content: Tata Consultancy Services has postponed the onboarding of approximately 600 experienced lateral hires. NITES has appealed to the Labour Minister, seeking intervention for definite timelines, compensation, and mental health support.

title: Meditation apps 'don't work’: Google's ex-CEO has an advice for those trying focus at work
content: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt advises young professionals to disconnect from digital devices for enhanced focus and relaxation. He criticizes the tech industry's role in creating attention-grabbing technologies and dismisses meditation apps as ineffective.

title: IND vs ENG: Sidhu predicts India’s XI for 4th Test; calls Siraj 'unsung hero'
content: As India prepares for a crucial Test against England, former cricketer Navjot Singh Sidhu has proposed his predicted XI, advocating for Sai Sudharsan's inclusion and questioning Karun Nair's position. Sidhu highlighted Sudharsan's strong domestic and IPL performances, emphasizing his technical skills. Despite Shubman Gill's support for Nair, the final team selection remains uncertain, with India aiming to level the series.

title: Ajay Devgn mutes family WA group: Calls Kajol and kids’ chats ‘too much bakwas’
content: As Ajay Devgn promotes 'Son Of Sardaar 2', he shared insights into his family life with Kajol and their children, Nysa and Yug. Ajay revealed he mutes the family group chat due to its constant 'nonsense'. He also mentioned that while Nysa plans family vacations, Yug prefers staying home, mirroring Ajay's own relaxed attitude towards travel.

title: ‘The only right answer is…’: Bill Gates on daughter’s unexpected ask
content: Bill Gates, the Microsoft co-founder, recently took on a customer service role at Phia, his daughter Phoebe's AI-powered fashion startup. Phoebe and her co-founder Sophia Kianni developed Phia, a platform that helps users compare prices across numerous online retailers. Gates emphasized the importance of directly engaging with users to understand a product's functionality and potential issues.

title: Watch | 'You are a star': Harmanpreet's gesture for Kranti Goud wins hearts
content: Indian cricket celebrated a memorable victory against England in the third ODI, highlighted by Kranti Goud's record-breaking six-wicket haul. Captain Harmanpreet Kaur, recognising Goud's stellar performance, shared her Player of the Match award with the young pacer, calling her "a star." Goud's crucial wickets and Harmanpreet's century helped India secure the series 2-1.

title: Mutton Rogan Josh spices up Bihar politics on Shravan Monday
content: Bihar's political scene is heating up. Mutton dishes are at the center of controversy during the holy month of Shrawan. Tejashwi Yadav accuses NDA leaders of hypocrisy over meat consumption. He highlights BJP MLAs enjoying mutton during Shrawan. Union Minister Rajiv Ranjan also hosted a mutton party. Prashant Kishor served 'vegetarian biryani'.

title: Gold price prediction today: Where is gold rate headed - here’s the outlook
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are expected to trade sideways, influenced by Trump's tariff deadline and mixed US economic data. Silver outperformed gold due to safe-haven demand fueled by trade tensions and political pressure on the Federal Reserve.

title: Gabrielle Union says surrogacy felt like public humiliation; shares emotional journey
content: Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union faced significant challenges in starting a family. Union recently shared her emotional struggles with Marie Claire, revealing that miscarriages and the subsequent surrogacy journey took a toll on her mental health. She described the experience as feeling like a "f---ing public humiliation" when it didn't go as planned.

title: Emotional Tribute: Diogo Jota's wife pens heartfelt note - 'Until death do us apart'
content: Rute Cardoso, wife of the late Liverpool star Diogo Jota, shared poignant wedding photos marking their first month together, weeks after his tragic death. Jota, 28, died in a car accident in Spain. Liverpool will retire his number 20 shirt as a tribute, a first in the club's history.

title: Man in Alwar kills 5-year-old nephew in tantric ritual to 'bring back' wife
content: In Alwar, a five-year-old was killed in a sorcery ritual. The uncle of the child wanted his wife to return home. He contacted a sorcerer who asked for a child sacrifice. The uncle lured his nephew with candy. He killed the child and hid the body. Police arrested the uncle and the sorcerer.

title: Maharashtra BJP neta’s aide Prafulla Lodha booked in third rape case
content: Prafulla Lodha, an alleged aide of a BJP leader, faces accusations of sexual assault in Pune, adding to similar cases in Mumbai. He's accused of exploiting a woman seeking job assistance for her husband, threatening her job when she refused his advances. Lodha is already in Mumbai police custody for allegedly assaulting other women under false pretenses of employment.

title: Trump in deep mud as new photos reveal Epstein attended his wedding - see pics
content: New photos and videos have surfaced, reigniting scrutiny of Donald Trump's past relationship with convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. The visuals include images from Trump's 1993 wedding and a 1999 Victoria's Secret fashion show. Trump, when questioned about the newly surfaced wedding photo, dismissed CNN as "fake news."

title: Saiyaara headed for Rs 150 crore mark; movie among top 5 highest-earning of 2025
content: Mohit Suri's 'Saiyaara,' starring debutants Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda, is a box office sensation, earning Rs 132.25 crore in five days. Surpassing established stars' films, it's now among 2025's top five Bollywood earners. Strong word-of-mouth and positive reviews are fueling its success. Analysts predict it could reach Rs 200 crore, an unprecedented achievement for a newcomer-led film.

title: Sports Governance Bill | BCCI under new law: Must seek recognition, follow tribunal
content: The government is set to introduce the 'National Sports Governance Bill 2025' in Parliament, aiming for transparent functioning of sports federations and athlete protection. Alongside, the 'National Anti-Doping (Amendment) Bill, 2025' will be tabled. A key highlight is that the BCCI will come under the bill's purview, resolving disputes through a 'National Sports Tribunal'.

title: ‘Massive trade deal’: Trump announces 15% reciprocal tariffs for Japan
content: Donald Trump declared the completion of a significant trade agreement with Japan, averting a threatened 25% tariff. The deal includes a 15% American tariff on Japanese imports and a $550 billion Japanese investment in the U.S., purportedly generating numerous jobs. Japan will also open its markets to American cars, trucks, rice, and other agricultural products, subject to reciprocal 15% tariffs.

title: WCL: AB de Villiers' stunning relay catch against India goes viral - WATCH
content: AB de Villiers showcased his enduring brilliance in the World Championship of Legends, starring with both bat and in the field. His explosive 63* propelled South Africa Champions to a formidable total, while a stunning relay catch to dismiss Yusuf Pathan highlighted his athleticism.

title: Heavy rain batters Delhi-NCR: Waterlogging reported at key spots
content: New Delhi experienced heavy rainfall on Tuesday morning, leading to waterlogging in several areas, particularly in south and southwest Delhi. The weather department forecasts continued showers throughout the day. The minimum temperature remained normal at 26 degrees Celsius, with a maximum of 35 degrees Celsius expected.

title: Boney Kapoor stuns with weight loss transformation; loses 26 kgs without gym
content: Boney Kapoor has stunned the internet with his remarkable 26 kg weight loss, achieved without any gym visits. He credits his transformation to a disciplined diet, skipping dinner and opting for soup at night, along with a breakfast of fruit juice and jawar roti. Kapoor revealed that his late wife, Sridevi, inspired him to prioritize his health and lose weight.

title: ‘Serial borrower from IMF’: India mocks Pakistan at UN; cites terror, economic rot
content: At the UN's 80th anniversary, India strongly criticized Pakistan for promoting cross-border terrorism, citing the Pahalgam attack and Operation Sindoor. India's ambassador highlighted India's progress versus Pakistan's struggles with terrorism and economic instability. Pakistan raised concerns about the Indus Waters Treaty being held in abeyance and the unresolved Kashmir dispute, accusing India of violating UN resolutions.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens above 25,100; BSE Sensex up over 250 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Wednesday. While Nifty50 was above 25,100, BSE Sensex was up over 250 points.

title: IND vs ENG | New challenges at Old Trafford! India likely to play Karun, Sai
content: Ahead of the fourth Test in Manchester, India grapples with injuries, forcing potential lineup changes with Anshul Kamboj possibly debuting. Captain Shubman Gill expresses confidence despite the setbacks, while England enjoys stability, making only a single change. The overcast conditions and covered pitch at Old Trafford raise expectations for a bowler-friendly match, influencing team selection strategies.

title: 'Weak attempt at distraction': Obama offers rare rebuke on Trump’s ‘treason’ claims
content: Former President Obama's office refuted Trump's accusations of "treason" and election manipulation, labeling them "ridiculous." Trump's claims, based on assertions by Gabbard and Ratcliffe, allege Obama administration officials manipulated intelligence. Obama's spokesperson defended the integrity of the 2016 election findings, citing a bipartisan Senate report affirming Russian influence but not vote manipulation.

title: IND vs ENG | Weather Updates: Rain threat looms over 4th Test in Manchester
content: The crucial fourth Test between India and England at Old Trafford faces weather uncertainties, with a 30% chance of rain threatening frequent stoppages. Overcast conditions could favour fast bowlers, potentially aiding India's seam attack led by Bumrah and Siraj. India, aiming for their first Old Trafford win, grapples with injuries, ruling out Nitish Reddy and impacting their all-rounder strategy.

title: ‘Govt is the beggar, not farmers’: Manikrao Kokate
content: Maharashtra Agriculture Minister Manikrao Kokate ignited controversy by likening the state government to a "beggar" while clarifying his earlier remarks on crop insurance, drawing sharp criticism from Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis and opposition leaders. His statement, made in response to questions about a previous controversial remark, was deemed inappropriate, reigniting calls for his removal and sparking outrage among political figures.

title: Digital arrest: Crooks use ‘tattoo and mole verification’ to strip 2 Bengaluru women
content: In Bengaluru, two women were victims of a digital arrest scam. Fraudsters posing as police officers coerced them into stripping during a fake online examination. The women transferred Rs 58,447 before realizing the deception. They were threatened with nude photos being released after seeking help from a friend.

title: Bareilly’s digital boom: How labourers, painters, scrap dealers turned YouTube stars
content: Hajiyapur, a village in UP's Bareilly, is witnessing a digital revolution driven by locals creating online content. Individuals like Javed Hussain, a former laborer turned YouTube comedian with 5.6 million subscribers, and Md Movin, a 65-year-old scrap collector with 7 million subscribers, exemplify this transformation.

title: 'Nostradamus of Balkans': Baba Vanga's scariest predictions are already unfolding
content: Baba Vanga, the 'Nostradamus of the Balkans,' gained global recognition for her predictions, including 9/11 and Obama's election. Her forecasts extend to natural disasters in Asia, a global economic collapse, and contact with aliens. She also foresaw the end of caste systems, new diseases countered by medical advancements, artificial organs by 2026, and a declining European population by 2025.

title: IND vs ENG: Harmanpreet's ton, Kranti's six-for power India to series win
content: India clinched the ODI series against England with a 13-run victory, highlighted by Kranti  Goud's stunning six-wicket haul. Harmanpreet Kaur's century propelled India to 318/5. England's chase fell short despite Nat Sciver-Brunt's valiant 98. Goud's achievement marks her as the second-youngest Indian to secure a five-wicket haul, while Kaur reached 4000 ODI runs, solidifying India's dominant performance.

title: Watch: Shraddha Kapoor and Rahul Mody spotted on 'Saiyaara' movie date
content: Shraddha Kapoor and Rahul Mody were recently spotted enjoying a movie date at a screening of 'Saiyaara', directed by Mohit Suri. Kapoor praised Suri's film, which stars Ahaan Pandey and Aneet Padda, highlighting its emotional impact. On the professional front, Kapoor is reportedly collaborating with Rahi Anil Barve and may reunite with Aditya Roy Kapur in a future project.

title: Fire breaks out mid-air on Sydney–Hobart Virgin Australia flight
content: A Virgin Australia flight from Sydney to Hobart experienced a fire caused by a power bank in carry-on luggage, prompting an emergency response. The cabin crew quickly extinguished the flames, and all passengers disembarked safely. Virgin Australia is now reviewing its lithium battery policies in coordination with safety authorities following the incident.

title: IND vs ENG: Shastri says Jadeja lacks self-belief – 'If he has even 40%...'
content: Ravi Shastri believes Ravindra Jadeja needs more self-belief to consistently win matches for India, citing the Lord's Test against England as an example. Despite Jadeja's talent and first-class triple centuries, Shastri feels he hasn't fully realized his batting potential. He highlighted the mutual respect between Jadeja and Ben Stokes, two of the game's top all-rounders, after the tense Lord's Test.

title: Olympics | United States bans trans from women's events
content: Following President Trump's executive order, the USOPC has banned transgender women from competing in women's Olympic and Paralympic events, effective July 2025. Citing the need for fair and safe competition, the policy change aligns with federal mandates and mirrors similar adjustments within the NCAA. This decision arrives as Los Angeles prepares to host the 2028 Summer Olympics.

title: Venus, 45, wins DC match; oldest since Navratilova
content: Venus Williams became the second-oldest woman to win a tour-level singles match in professional tennis at age 45, beating Peyton Stearns -- 22 years her junior -- by a 6-3, 6-4 score at the DC Open on Tuesday night.

title: Smart credits Doncic with assist for Lakers move
content: Marcus Smart credited Luka Doncic for recruiting him to Los Angeles at his introductory news conference with the Lakers on Tuesday.

title: Terps' Locksley: Lost locker room amid pay divide
content: Maryland coach Mike Locksley admitted Tuesday he "lost" the locker room in 2024 over which players to compensate.

title: Raleigh's 39th HR helps halt Brewers' 11-game run
content: Seattle All-Star Cal Raleigh hit his major league-leading 39th home run of the season, Logan Gilbert tossed 6⅓ shutout innings and the Mariners ended the Milwaukee Brewers' 11-game winning streak, posting a 1-0 victory Tuesday night at T-Mobile Park.

title: Ohio St. prioritized 3-way QB battle over portal
content: Ohio State coach Ryan Day said he didn't add a transfer portal QB this offseason because he wanted to develop the three passers the Buckeyes have on campus.

title: Raiders reunite ex-Pro Bowler Adams with Carroll
content: The Raiders signed three-time Pro Bowl safety Jamal Adams, reuniting him with coach Pete Carroll, whom he played under in Seattle.

title: Sources: Saints eye Blackmon to replace Mathieu
content: Following Tyrann Mathieu's retirement, the Saints are working to sign Julian Blackmon, one of the top safeties available, sources told ESPN.

title: Holliday rate: Rox give record bonus to star's son
content: The Rockies have signed fourth overall pick Ethan Holliday to a $9 million bonus, the richest ever given to a high school player.

title: 😬 NBA's biggest roster mistakes since 2020
content: Zach Kram examines the deals, trades and picks that all 30 NBA teams would like to take back from the 2020s.

title: Let the deals begin! MLB trade deadline updates: Latest rumors and analysis
content: Which contenders will make the biggest splash? Here's what we're hearing as 6 p.m. ET on July 31 approaches.

title: 'We're a very dangerous team': What winning means for the Red Sox's trade deadline plans
content: Rising from under .500 to the thick of contention couldn't have come at a better time for the club's 2025 hopes.

title: Randle-Towns trade, Bridges to New York and more: Regrading 2024 offseason moves
content: NBA expert Kevin Pelton looks back at 10 of the biggest trade and free agency moves and regrades them.

title: 14 teams and loads of questions they must answer to win the 2025 CFP crown
content: The fewer things that must go right, the better a team's chances. Here's what has to fall each contender's way.

title: England's late show stuns Italy as super-subs seal final spot
content: England's super-subs saved the day with minutes to go against Italy as the Lionesses snuck into the Euro 2025 final.

title: Power Rankings: Can Lynx sustain? Biggest second-half question for every team
content: Can New York catch Minnesota? How much will Caitlin Clark play? Here are the challenges facing each team.

title: Best of the rest: Who's left in NHL free agency?
content: Most of the NHL free agent deals are handed out July 1. But there are still some players left -- here are the top remaining unrestricted free agents.

title: Scheffler's dominance, players to watch and how the Ryder Cup teams look
content: What's next for Scottie Scheffler? Who are the locks for Bethpage, and who has work to do? Following The Open, we look ahead to the rest of the 2025 golf season.

title: Betting buzz: Dallas Cowboys' season win total lowest since 2003
content: The Cowboys' win total for this season has dropped to 7.5 at ESPN BET, the lowest preseason win total for a Cowboys team since 2003.

title: Replacing Bellingham: How will Real Madrid cope without star midfielder?
content: Jude Bellingham is out for 12 weeks with a shoulder injury, so which Real Madrid players will have to step up in his absence?

title: Will Ekitike be a Liverpool hit or flop? Why he's so hard to scout
content: Hugo Ekitike is everything "dumb" clubs get wrong about transfers, and everything smart clubs get right.

title: Numbers you need to know as you prep for draft day
content: Make of them what you will, but here are the stats from last season that you should be aware of as you prepare for your drafts.

title: Petitti letter: Michigan sign-stealing penalties have gone far enough
content: Despite charges of serious NCAA rule violations, commissioner indicates sanctions have run their course

title: Grading 50-plus NBA deals, including the CP3-Clippers reunion
content: Kevin Pelton breaks down the most impactful signings, including the Clippers bringing back Chris Paul.

title: Spain finally have all of Barcelona's midfield stars in top form together
content: Alexia Putellas, Aitana Bonmatí and Patri Guijarro have been unable to combine for Spain as they do for Barcelona. At Euro 2025, that is changing.

title: Berger typifies Germany's fight as tough semifinal looms
content: Germany needed their goalkeeper at her best vs. France and will need her again to star again to beat Spain.

title: Source: Mbappé to take No. 10 jersey at Madrid
content: Kylian Mbappé will wear the No. 10 jersey at Real Madrid next season, switching from the No. 9 he wore last year, a source confirmed to ESPN.

title: MLS All-Star coach hopeful missing Messi plays
content: The 2025 MLS All-Star Game in Austin, Texas, was supposed to be the first featuring Lionel Messi after injury kept him out of the 2024 event. That appeared less likely following Monday's first training session.

title: Wiegman: England run to Euro final like a 'movie'
content: England manager Sarina Wiegman said her team's run at Euro 2025 is like a movie after they scored another dramatic win over Italy in the semifinals.

title: De Gea: Madrid move collapsed 'for a reason'
content: Former Manchester United goalkeeper David de Gea has said he will only reveal details of his failed move to Real Madrid once his career is over.

title: Italy 'hurt' after falling 1 minute short of dream
content: Italy coach Andrea Soncin found solace in heartbreak after his side came within one minute of reaching the Euro 2025 final, saying it was an encouraging sign that they came so close before losing 2-1 to England in extra time on Tuesday.

title: Sources: Chelsea eyeing Garnacho; Utd drop value
content: Any potential Alejandro Garnacho transfer from Man United to Chelsea would depend on players first departing Stamford Bridge, sources have told ESPN.

title: Arteta: Nine teams could win Premier League title
content: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta said he believes his side have the "right ingredients" to end their 21-year Premier League title hiatus.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Bayern growing confident of $88.1m Díaz deal
content: Bayern Munich have been given clear encouragement in their bid to sign Luis Díaz from Liverpool. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Pacquiao back in welterweight top 10; Usyk retains heavyweight top spot
content: Manny Pacquiao reclaims a spot in the welterweight rankings. Here are the latest ESPN divisional rankings.

title: 23-year-old Indian student brutally assaulted in Adelaide; suffers brain trauma, facial fracture
content: A group of men approached Charanpreet Singh and attacked him over a car parking dispute; police arrested a 20-year-old Enfield man for assault and others fled and remain unidentified

title: Supreme Court directs woman IPS officer to tender unconditional apology to estranged husband, his family
content: A Bench comprising Chief Justice B.R. Gavai and Justice Augustine George Masih further directed the woman IPS officer and her parents to tender an unconditional apology to the family of the estranged husband

title: Parliament Monsoon Session: Both Houses continue to remain in deadlock over Opposition protests
content: In both Houses, Opposition members protested demanding a discussion on the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of electoral rolls in Bihar by the Election Commission of India

title: Eyeing aspiring farmers, agriculture university in Bengaluru to launch paid consultancy service
content: The university’s experts will provide cropping plan based on requirements, nature of land and availability of labour, besides site visit

title: Manipur theatre personality Ratan Thiyam passes away
content: Ratan Thiyam was one of the pioneers of the Theatre of Roots movement that blended ancient Indian theatrical traditions with modern themes

title: Trump reaches silver jubilee of India-Pakistan ceasefire claim, PM totally quiet: Congress
content: He has trumpeted 25 times in the last 73 days but the Prime Minister of India is totally quiet - finding time only to travel abroad and to destabilise democratic institutions at home, says Congress leader Jairam Ramesh

title: Justice Tarlok Singh Chauhan sworn in as Chief Justice of Jharkhand High Court
content: The name of Justice Chauhan, the second senior-most judge of the Himachal Pradesh High Court, was recommended by the Supreme Court Collegium on May 26

title: Mortal remains of Kerala trainee pilot killed in Canada to be flown to Kochi July 26
content: 23-year-old was killed after his flight collided with another during a practice session in Manitoba province in Canada on July 8

title: War room set up to monitor dengue cases in Yadgir in Karnataka
content: An official said that this is a routine process that the department takes up every year between June and September

title: Pakistan steeped in fanaticism, terrorism: India tells UNSC meeting
content: India calls for zero tolerance for terrorism, criticises Pakistan’s support for cross-border terrorism at U.N. Security Council meeting

title: Mortal remains of V.S. Achuthanandan reach Alappuzha
content: The funeral of Achuthanandan will be held with full State honours at Punnapra-Vayalar Martyrs’ Memorial at Valiya Chudukkad

title: Redeeming India’s nuclear power promise
content: If India is to meet its ambitious target of 100 GW of power generating capacity by 2047, it needs foreign partners as well as private entities to participate in the nuclear sector which has been till now completely under the government

title: How different constitutional drafts imagined India
content: Between 1895 and 1948, various constitutional drafts were proposed reflecting contrasting ideologies — from early liberalism to Gandhian decentralism to radical socialism

title: Boys continue to outnumber girls in private schools in India | Data
content: In the northern and western States, the share of girls enrolled in any school is lower than India’s average of 48.1%

title: Polyandry part of ancient tribal tradition, says Himachal Ministers after woman marries two men
content: Revenue laws of Himachal Pradesh recognise this tradition, which is named “Jodidara”. The tradition is also recognised under sections 494 and 495 of the Indian Penal Code

title: Multiple stories of humiliation of Devadasi children
content: The need for naming the father has become a problem, especially after the application process has been moved online

title: Karnataka proposes a new Devadasi legislation with clauses on paternity test, right to property
content: Inter-departmental consultation is almost complete on the proposed law and could soon be brought before the Cabinet

title: Indian man injured in ‘racist’ attack in Ireland’s Dublin
content: Indian Ambassador to Ireland Akhilesh Mishra was among those taking to social media to express his shock over the attack and also questioned some of the Irish media coverage of the violent assault

title: T.N. Language Atlas: 96 languages spoken in State as per 2011 Census
content: In the Language Atlas, the term ‘speakers’ referred only to individuals who reported a particular language as their mother tongue during the Census enumeration

title: A bitter episode in the DMK-Congress relationship in Tamil Nadu during 1971 polls
content: In 1971 the two parties had come together for the first time to face the polls when the Lok Sabha and Assembly elections were held simultaneously

title: Advanced street cameras, toll plaza alerts: How Patna murder accused were nabbed in Kolkata
content: Bihar-based gangster Chandan Mishra was out on parole and was shot dead in an open firing inside Paras Hospital in Patna in the morning on July 17. The ‘leader’ of the hit team and three others were arrested in Kolkata on July 18 in joint operations of the Bihar Police, West Bengal Police, and Kolkata Police

title: Sheva Koliwada women’s group to launch indefinite JNPA channel blockade from August 15 over long-standing rehabilitation issues
content: In 1984, an entire village in Maharashtra gave up their homes and land for the development of a major port in Navi Mumbai. Four decades later, the displaced families continue to live in temporary shelters, battling neglect and unsanitary living conditions

title: Rajasthan Governor lays emphasis on social concerns in health management
content: Haribhau Bagade said the institutions should pay attention to research for improving health care services

title: Quality concerns continue to haunt Polavaram project, despite foreign experts’ recommendations
content: Manual and guidelines relating to quality control are yet to be published; draft manual prepared by AFRI awaits approval from several Central, State agencies

title: MP Kesineni Sivanath urges Railway Board to expedite projects in Vijayawada Division
content: Saying that despite 550 schools meeting eligibility criteria for PM Shri schools in NTR district only 27 schools sanctioned, the MP urges the Centre to reconsider allocation

title: A.P. CM orders satellite survey for crop mapping to ensure better income of farmers
content: Naidu insists on crop health monitoring in real time; officials told to cross-verify satellite data with field inputs and guide farmers to cultivate crops in clusters

title: Reforms or regression?
content: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu will have to balance industrial development with labour rights

title: Telangana High Court dismisses welfare association’s plea over 300 square yards at Kowkur
content: The dispute began when the adjacent landowner started building a compound wall, prompting the villa association to object

title: ‘Remedial education must be a sustained component in schooling system’
content: Telangana Education Commission chairman said the consultation was important, in the wake of poor comprehension levels and foundational learning crisis

title: August 15 set as deadline to complete survey to acquire land for Kochi Bypass
content: Surveyors, posted in 18 villages through which the proposed 44.70-km-long greenfield highway will pass, are in the process of consolidating data like survey numbers and the precise extent of plots that ought to be acquired

title: GI tag sought for Kancheepuram idli
content: Unlike the smooth and fluffy South Indian idli, the Kancheepuram idli is made using coarsely ground parboiled rice and black gram (urad dal), which gives it a dense and grainy texture

title: Manjinder Sirsa moves Delhi HC over report on Congress leader Kamal Nath’s presence at crime scene during 1984 anti-sikh riots
content: The petition claimed Kamal Nath’s presence at the scene of crime was well documented in police records and the same was also carried in multiple newspapers

title: M.P. cop kills himself inside police station premises; alleges harassment by officers, sand mafia
content: Pramod Pavan shared multiple videos to his relatives and on various WhatsApp groups before killing himself

title: Bihar EOU arrests a man in connection with  ₹101 crore embezzlement
content: According to EOU, main accused was absconding for the last 4 years and Enforcement Case Information Reports (ECIR) under PMLA has also been registered by the ED

title: Land pooling policy: SAD stages demonstration; AAP govt tweaks policy
content: In its amendments, it was approved that farmers will now receive an annual livelihood allowance of ₹1 lakh until their land is developed — a fivefold increase compared to the ₹20,000 given by previous governments

title: Don’t look at all judges transferred from one High Court to another with suspicion: Justice Battu Devanand
content: Says, not all transfers in the higher judiciary are made on grounds of corruption, nepotism or vested interest

title: Protection from revealing identity must be extended to all victims of sexual offences; not just rape and POCSO Act cases, T.N. govt. tells Madras HC
content: State Public Prosecutor tells Justice N. Anand Venkatesh that judicial magistrates can also direct police to submit such FIRs in sealed covers to prevent leakage of names

title: Two accused injured in police encounter and one held in Chandan Mishra murder case
content: According to the police, the arrested accused Abhishek was present at the place of occurrence and drove away on the motorcycle with the two shooters Raviranjan and Balwant

title: Manikrao Kokate denies playing rummy during Assembly, calls controversy politically motivated
content: Maharashtra Agriculture Minister Manikrao Kokate has called the gaming allegations a politically motivated attempt to defame him and refused to resign until a full inquiry is conducted

title: History of air crash probes shows investigators disagree on pilot complicity
content: Since 1994, there have been only six confirmed instances globally involving commercial planes where investigating agencies attributed the accident to actions by the pilot. Within these, only four have published reports and analyses in academic literature

title: Boulder falls into a street in Vaniyambadi due to rain; none injured
content: Residents call for safety measures; civic officials blame the incident on the illegal construction of houses in the area as it could have weakened the soil and led to the boulder rolling off the hillock

title: Ahead of PM’s visit, India highlights presence of Khalistani activists in the U.K.
content: Final touches are being put in India-U.K. FTA, which could increase bilateral trade by almost 39%; Khalistani activists undermine social cohesion, warns Foreign Secy; Indian fugitives on British soil will also be discussed

title: Jammu and Kashmir L-G sets up portal to support terror-affected families
content: Toll free helpline numbers have also been established at the offices of the Divisional Commissioners in both Jammu and Kashmir divisions

title: In collecting signatures for removal of Justice Yashwant Varma, Congress started off early to deny government ‘sole credit’
content: The party decided that by letting a government-sponsored motion in Lok Sabha, the Opposition would let the government take sole credit for the motion aimed at uncovering alleged corruption in the judiciary

title: Monsoon response team formed to address waterlogging woes in VMC
content: Team will comprise 80 sanitary and planning secretaries, says Vijayawada Municipal Corporation Commissioner

title: Weight gain begins 8 weeks after stopping anti-obesity drugs: study
content: Researchers found that people who lost more weight during treatment were more likely to regain weight, even if they made lifestyle changes

title: Mehbooba Mufti calls for systemic reform of J&K Police JICs
content: Demand follows Supreme Court’s order for CBI probe, arrests, and ₹50 lakh compensation in custodial torture case

title: ‘Urban Naxals’ with overseas funding are stalling development projects in Maharashtra, says Devendra Fadnavis
content: ‘Urban Naxalism’ is spreading, and they are using misinformation to derail development projects, says the Maharashtra Chief Minister

title: Worker killed as under-construction culvert collapses in Guntur
content: Guntur Municipal Corporation assures full support to family of the deceased, while contractor promises to offer ₹5 lakh as financial assistance

title: In over 90% of sewer deaths, workers had no safety gear: government audit
content: In an audit of 54 sewer deaths in 2022 and 2023, no mechanised equipment was given in 47 cases; only five of the deceased workers had gloves, only one had gumboots; workers’ consent was not taken in 27 cases

title: Sivaganga custodial death case: Madras High Court directs T.N. government to pay ₹25 lakh as interim compensation
content: A Division Bench of Justices S.M. Subramaniam and A.D. Maria Clete has said this sum is in addition to ₹7.50 lakh as  compensation already handed over to Ajith Kumar’s family

title: Another case of massive tree-felling reported from CHR
content: Case reported from Uchilukuth, near Pethotty, in Santhanpara.  Trees have been felled,  pond constructed, and earth movers deployed to clear a 40-acre plot in the Cardamom Hill Reserve  area

title: Displaced Manipur families get ready to return home under security cover
content: Some of the family members have begun cleaning the houses they abandoned on the fringes of Imphal Valley after the ethnic conflict broke out in May 2023

title: Three Judicial Officers appointed Delhi HC judges
content: With the nine new appointments in last two days, the strength of judges at the Delhi High court will reach 43

title: Stalking case accused named Haryana assistant advocate general
content: 'Kannappa' actress Preity Mukhundhan's top ethnic looks Suriya Unwrapped: 10 interesting facts about Tamil cinema’s versatile star Ahead of 'Son Of Sardar 2,' check out THESE ethnic looks of Neeru Bajwa that would take your breath away Priyanka Mohan's stunning style moments you can't miss Lavanya Tripathi Dazzles in Ethnic Elegance Hina Khan’s regal look redefines festive glam How to develop good manners in your child Karthika Nair stuns with timeless beauty and effortless charm ‘Saiyaara’ girl Aneet Padda’s wardrobe is every Gen-Z’s fashion dream 10 baby names inspired by Indian Royalty

title: Gwalior: Speeding car hits Kanwar pilgrims group - 4 Kanwariyas killed
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .

title: SC grants IPS officer's husband reprieve from arrest in dowry case for 2 months
content: Karthika Nair stuns with timeless beauty and effortless charm ‘Saiyaara’ girl Aneet Padda’s wardrobe is every Gen-Z’s fashion dream 10 baby names inspired by Indian Royalty 10 lines by Amrita Pritam that tug the heart Charming looks of Gayathri Yuvraaj Rooted right: Top 8 soils for tree growth Top 10 cutest animals in India Put your mind to the test: 8 brain teasers that every student must try 9 surprisingly easy habits that high-performing students swear by 68-year-old Dimple Kapadia's iconic haircare routine

title: "F*** Off, Indian": Man Brutally Assaulted, Racially Abused In Australia
content: An Indian man was allegedly brutally assaulted and racially abused by a group of unidentified men during a car parking dispute in South Australia's Adelaide last week.

title: Bihar Man Shot, Stabbed Multiple Times While Visiting Nepal
content: A man from Bihar was shot and stabbed while visiting Nepal. The victim, identified as Pankaj Kumar, a resident of Sitamarhi district, was killed late on Sunday night in the Langur Khola area of Sindhuli district of Nepal.

title: Mamata Banerjee Launches New Programme, Allots Rs 10 Lakh A Booth
content: Ahead of elections in the state, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee has announced a new government initiative -- 'Amar Para, Amar Samadhan' (Our locality, our solution).

title: Trump Is Asked Why "Kiss Cam" Couple More Famous Than His Would-Be Assassin
content: US President Donald Trump said that investigating agencies have found nothing "abnormal" about the man who attempted to assassinate him a year ago.

title: At Madhya Pradesh Police Training Centres, Ramcharitmanas May Be Recited Every Night
content: In Madhya Pradesh's Police Training Centres, a fresh cultural and moral dimension may soon be added to the daily routine of police trainees.

title: Jeffrey Epstein Spotted In Trump's 1993 Wedding Pics. White House Replies
content: Convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein attended US President Donald Trump and Marla Maples's wedding ceremony in 1993 at the Plaza Hotel in New York, new photos and video footage show.

title: Mutton Politics In Bihar Poll Pot, Tejashwi Yadav Slams NDA Meet Menu
content: Heated exchanges between the ruling JDU-BJP and the Opposition RJD are keeping the election pot boiling in Bihar, and now mutton politics is on the stove.

title: MAGA-Style "Anti-Globalist" Politics Arrives In Japan
content: Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba's coalition lost its upper house majority in an election on Sunday; the "Japanese first" Sanseito party, created only five years ago, increased its seats from two to 15.

title: "Gloves Off': Stephen Colbert's Message To Trump After Show's Cancellation
content: Stephen Colbert had an unflinching message for US President Donald Trump in his first broadcast since his "Late Show" was cancelled amid a political firestorm -- "the gloves are off."

title: Home Ministry To Move Out Of Iconic North Block Under Central Vista Revamp
content: The Ministry of Home Affairs is all set to move out of the historic North Block for the first time. Under the Central Vista redevelopment project, the MHA will shift into a new, state-of-the-art office complex in the next few days.

title: Throat Slit, Stabbed 25 Times: UK Man Jailed For Killing Estranged Wife
content: A 26-year-old man who stabbed his estranged wife to death on a busy Bradford street has been sentenced to life in prison with a minimum of 28 years.

title: "Father Ne Sahi Kiya": Comment On Radhika Yadav Video Shocks Friend
content: A close friend of Radhika Yadav has spotlighted how "men defended men" after she accused the murdered tennis player's family of restricting her freedom and shaming her over her lifestyle.

title: Trump Accuses Obama Of Treason Over Russia Interference In 2016 Election Report
content: Donald Trump on Tuesday accused his predecessor Barack Obama of treason and called for his prosecution over a report alleging that officials in the Democrat's administration manipulated information on Russia's interference in the 2016 election.

title: Heavy Rain In Delhi, Streets Waterlogged, Orange Alert Issued
content: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) had issued an orange alert for Delhi, predicting moderate rain (5-15 mm per hour) along with thunderstorms.

title: India's "Serial Borrower From IMF" Jibe At Pakistan During UN Debate
content: India ripped into Pakistan at the United Nations on Tuesday as it pointed to the differences between the two nuclear-armed neighbours on security, social, and financial parameters.

title: US Again Claims Role In India-Pakistan De-escalation. India's Response
content: Washington once again claimed that the Trump administration played a key role in "de-escalations" between India and Pakistan in recent months, as part of its broader commitment to mediating disputes and advancing peaceful resolutions worldwide.

title: Parliament Monsoon Session Live: 6 Bills Listed In Parliament, Opposition Demands Bihar Roll Revision Debate
content: Time allotted for discussion on Operation Sindoor will be extended by nine hours. The debate is expected to remain a focal point as the House grapples with multiple contentious issues.

title: Pune Man Duped Of Rs 5 Lakh In Share Market Investment Scam
content: A man from Pune in Maharashtra has allegedly been duped of more than Rs 5 lakh after being lured by a cyber fraudster under the pretext of investment in share market for good returns, police said.

title: How A Gaza Refugee Artist Embroiders Her 'Pain' On Canvas
content: In her new Paris home, Palestinian artist Maha Al-Daya pulled a needle and thread through material as news for war-torn Gaza blared in the background.

title: Source: Al Hilal interested in Newcastle's Isak
content: al Hilal have gathered information about the financial details which would be involved in any potential agreement . there has not yet been any formal contact with Newcastle, a source has told ESPN . the 25-year-old has also been linked with a move to liverpool . he was left out of the friendly with Celtic on sunday .

title: Caitlin Clark gives Iowa hoops special shipment of her player edition sneaker
content: WNBA star caitlin Clark surprised the Iowa Hawkeyes men's and women's basketball teams . she has consistently sported the Kobe Bryant signature shoe since her college days at Iowa . "it's not eve," she said last season .

title: Latest news, buzz from all 32 training camps: Chiefs see instant Mahomes-Rice connection
content: training camps have kicked off around the NFL . our 32 team reporters are on the ground each day following all the action . we have updated depth charts for all 32 teams . ari | ATL | BAL | BUF | CAR | CHI | CIN CLE | DAL | DEN | DET | GB | HOU | IND .

title: MMA divisional rankings: With Dustin Poirier retired, who gets his top-10 spot at lightweight?
content: Max Holloway beats Dustin Poirier in the final fight of his career . the lightweight fight at the weekend's main event in new Orleans had an impact on two weight classes in the latest ESPN divisional rankings . it's the man who defeated him, who leaves an opening at featherweight .

title: NFL training camp is here! Biggest storylines, roster projections and previews for all 32 teams
content: all 32 teams are looking to put in work as they start their quest to Super Bowl LX . the Philadelphia Eagles and Baltimore Ravens are two teams that have returned plenty of offensive starters . quarterback Aaron Rodgers is now a member of the Pittsburgh Steelers .
